title: VIEW AMD secures Meta as next big AI chip customer
description: Advanced Micro Devices said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell up to $60 billion worth of artificial intelligence chips to Meta Platforms over five years in a deal that allows the Facebook owner to purchase as much as 10% of the chip firm.
content:
The company had signed a similar pact with OpenAI last year, which was hailed as a vote of confidence in its chips and software, significantly boosting its stock price.

title: Policy bazooka could fend off jobless AI world
description: Stocks have slid on fears artificial intelligence‑driven losses will outweigh gains. Since 2022, sectors that rapidly adopted machine learning account for a third of unemployment. Tech pessimism may be overdone but slow monetary and fiscal policy could worsen short‑term pain.
content: LONDON, Feb 24 (Reuters Breakingviews) - The stock market is in a panic about the impact artificial intelligence will have on the jobs market. It’s reminiscent of the “lump of labour fallacy” taught in high school economics. The lesson goes that even... [2611 chars]
